experiences.title: Karbasi
experiences.explanation: As a frontend developer at Karbasi, I spearheaded the development of a high-performance and visually captivating e-commerce platform specifically designed for home decor and furnishing enthusiasts. Through my expertise in integrating technologies such as Vue.js and Tailwind CSS, I ensured a seamless and responsive user experience across various devices. My responsibilities included crafting dynamic and reusable components, optimizing page load speeds, and integrating third-party APIs to enhance the platform’s functionality. Collaborating closely with backend developers and UX designers, I diligently aligned the platform’s design and features with the preferences of our esteemed customers. Furthermore, I maintained a steadfast commitment to regular updates and testing, ensuring the platform’s functionality and security remained consistent with the latest industry standards.

experiences.title: Dehestaan
experiences.explanation: As the lead web developer at Dehestaan, I was responsible for designing and developing a comprehensive e-commerce platform focused on local agricultural products. I utilized modern technologies such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, ensuring the site was optimized for both user experience and search engine visibility. I implemented a content management system that allowed for easy content updates by the team and worked closely with designers to create an engaging and user-friendly interface. Additionally, I conducted thorough testing and debugging to ensure the site’s performance and security were top-notch.
